com.lss233.phoenix.math

类 Vector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lss233.phoenix.math.Vector
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Cloneable

    public class Vector
extends Object
implements Cloneable
    Represents a vector.

      构造器和说明

      Construct the vector with all axises as 0.

      Construct the vector with provided double axises.

      Construct the vector with provided float axises.
      Vector(int x, int y, int z)
      Construct the vector with provided integer axises.

      • dot

        public double dot(Vector other)
        Calculates the dot product of this vector with another. The dot product is defined as x1*x2+y1*y2+z1*z2. The returned value is a scalar.
        参数:
        other - The other vector
        返回:
        dot product

      • crossProduct

        public Vector crossProduct(Vector o)
        Calculates the cross product of this vector with another. The cross product is defined as:
        • x = y1 * z2 - y2 * z1
        • y = z1 * x2 - z2 * x1
        • z = x1 * y2 - x2 * y1
        参数:
        o - The other vector
        返回:
        The vector

      • normalize

        public Vector normalize()
        Converts this vector to a unit vector (a vector with length of 1).
        返回:
        The vector

      • zero

        public Vector zero()
        Zero this vector's axises.
        返回:
        The vector

      • isInAABB

        public boolean isInAABB(Vector min,
                        Vector max)
        Returns whether this vector is in an axis-aligned bounding box.

        The minimum and maximum vectors given must be truly the minimum and maximum X, Y and Z axises.

        参数:
        min - Minimum vector
        max - Maximum vector
        返回:
        whether this vector is in the AABB

      • isInSphere

        public boolean isInSphere(Vector origin,
                          double radius)
        Returns whether this vector is within a sphere.
        参数:
        origin - Sphere origin.
        radius - Sphere radius
        返回:
        whether this vector is in the sphere

                           float yaw,

        参数:

        yaw - The desired yaw.
        pitch - The desired pitch.
        返回:
        The location
